name: suppleness
content:
suppleness noun [U]
(ABILITY TO BEND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being able to bend easily or be bent easily: She tried a form of massage therapy that slowly improved her suppleness.
More examplesFewer examplesThe rate at which you slow down is determined only by the suppleness of your legs - and your nerve.Knox performs specialized foot and ankle exercises to maintain the suppleness required for the piece and to avoid injury.Stay active and your body will reward you with suppleness and agility. It's a non-oily liquid wax which cleans as it waterproofs and penetrates deeply giving a natural sheen to leather equipment and increases suppleness in the leather.An enriched conditioning creme which restores softness, suppleness and shine to hair.
